altername_name: Wizardry: Knight of Diamonds: The Second Scenario
name: Wizardry II: The Knight of Diamonds
overview: Wizardry II: The Knight of Diamonds (originally known as Wizardry: Knight of Diamonds - The Second Scenario) is the second game in the Wizardry series of role-playing video games. It was published in 1982 by Sir-Tech Software, Inc.
